title: Bug 2694Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Bug 2694Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press 'Add' for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

b. The 'Add' button should not add a hidden entry.

c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as '(default)' (see perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. Need a width hint for the dialog.

g. Why does the File editors Preference page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f.

Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, g.
OB: In the Editor Selection Dialog, when no entry is selected, the 'OK' button is enabled.
EB: In the Editor Selection Dialog, when no entry is selected, the 'OK' button should be disabled.
SR:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Verify that no entry is selected.
3. Check if the 'OK' button is enabled when it should be disabled.
